an4.159:1.2: ekaṃ samayaṃ āyasmā ānando kosambiyaṃ viharati ghositārāme.
an4.159:1.3: Atha kho aññatarā bhikkhunī aññataraṃ purisaṃ āmantesi:
an4.159:1.4: “ehi tvaṃ, ambho purisa, yenayyo ānando tenupasaṅkama; upasaṅkamitvā mama vacanena ayyassa ānandassa pāde sirasā vanda:
an4.159:1.6: Sā ayyassa ānandassa pāde sirasā vandatī’ti. Evañca vadehi:
an4.159:1.7: ‘sādhu kira, bhante, ayyo ānando yena bhikkhunupassayo yena sā bhikkhunī tenupasaṅkamatu anukampaṃ upādāyā’”ti.
an4.159:1.8: “Evaṃ, ayye”ti kho so puriso tassā bhikkhuniyā paṭissutvā yenāyasmā ānando tenupasaṅkami; upasaṅkamitvā āyasmantaṃ ānandaṃ abhivādetvā ekamantaṃ nisīdi. Ekamantaṃ nisinno kho so puriso āyasmantaṃ ānandaṃ etadavoca:
an4.159:2.2: Sā āyasmato ānandassa pāde sirasā vandati, evañca vadeti:
an4.159:2.3: ‘sādhu kira, bhante, āyasmā ānando yena bhikkhunupassayo yena sā bhikkhunī tenupasaṅkamatu anukampaṃ upādāyā’”ti.
an4.159:3.1: Atha kho āyasmā ānando nivāsetvā pattacīvaramādāya yena bhikkhunupassayo yena sā bhikkhunī tenupasaṅkami.
an4.159:3.2: Addasā kho sā bhikkhunī āyasmantaṃ ānandaṃ dūratova āgacchantaṃ.
an4.159:3.4: Atha kho āyasmā ānando yena sā bhikkhunī tenupasaṅkami; upasaṅkamitvā paññatte āsane nisīdi. Nisajja kho āyasmā ānando taṃ bhikkhuniṃ etadavoca:
an4.159:4.3: Taṇhāsambhūto ayaṃ, bhagini, kāyo taṇhaṃ nissāya.
an4.159:4.5: Mānasambhūto ayaṃ, bhagini, kāyo mānaṃ nissāya.
an4.159:5.2: Āhāro pahātabbo’ti, iti kho panetaṃ vuttaṃ.
an4.159:5.4: Idha, bhagini, bhikkhu paṭisaṅkhā yoniso āhāraṃ āhāreti:
an4.159:5.5: ‘neva davāya na madāya na maṇḍanāya na vibhūsanāya, yāvadeva imassa kāyassa ṭhitiyā yāpanāya vihiṃsūparatiyā brahmacariyānuggahāya. Iti purāṇañca vedanaṃ paṭihaṅkhāmi, navañca vedanaṃ na uppādessāmi. Yātrā ca me bhavissati anavajjatā ca phāsuvihāro cā’ti.
an4.159:5.6: So aparena samayena āhāraṃ nissāya āhāraṃ pajahati.
an4.159:5.7: ‘Āhārasambhūto ayaṃ, bhagini, kāyo āhāraṃ nissāya āhāro pahātabbo’t
an4.159:5.8: iti yaṃ taṃ vuttaṃ idametaṃ paṭicca vuttaṃ.
an4.159:6.2: Taṇhā pahātabbā’ti, iti kho panetaṃ vuttaṃ.
an4.159:6.5: ‘itthannāmo kira bhikkhu āsavānaṃ khayā anāsavaṃ cetovimuttiṃ paññāvimuttiṃ diṭṭheva dhamme sayaṃ abhiññā sacchikatvā upasampajja viharatī’ti.
an4.159:6.7: ‘kudāssu nāma ahampi āsavānaṃ khayā anāsavaṃ cetovimuttiṃ paññāvimuttiṃ diṭṭheva dhamme sayaṃ abhiññā sacchikatvā upasampajja viharissāmī’ti.
an4.159:6.8: So aparena samayena taṇhaṃ nissāya taṇhaṃ pajahati.
an4.159:6.9: ‘Taṇhāsambhūto ayaṃ, bhagini, kāyo taṇhaṃ nissāya taṇhā pahātabbā’ti,
an4.159:6.10: iti yaṃ taṃ vuttaṃ idametaṃ paṭicca vuttaṃ.
an4.159:7.2: Māno pahātabbo’ti, iti kho panetaṃ vuttaṃ.
an4.159:7.5: ‘itthannāmo kira bhikkhu āsavānaṃ khayā anāsavaṃ cetovimuttiṃ paññāvimuttiṃ diṭṭheva dhamme sayaṃ abhiññā sacchikatvā upasampajja viharatī’ti.
an4.159:7.7: ‘so hi nāma āyasmā āsavānaṃ khayā anāsavaṃ cetovimuttiṃ paññāvimuttiṃ diṭṭheva dhamme sayaṃ abhiññā sacchikatvā upasampajja viharissati;
an4.159:7.9: So aparena samayena mānaṃ nissāya mānaṃ pajahati.
an4.159:7.10: ‘Mānasambhūto ayaṃ, bhagini, kāyo, mānaṃ nissāya māno pahātabbo’ti,
an4.159:7.11: iti yaṃ taṃ vuttaṃ idametaṃ paṭicca vuttaṃ.
an4.159:9.1: Atha kho sā bhikkhunī mañcakā vuṭṭhahitvā ekaṃsaṃ uttarāsaṅgaṃ karitvā āyasmato ānandassa pādesu sirasā nipatitvā āyasmantaṃ ānandaṃ etadavoca:
an4.159:9.2: “accayo maṃ, bhante, accagamā, yathābālaṃ yathāmūḷhaṃ yathāakusalaṃ, yāhaṃ evamakāsiṃ.
an4.159:9.3: Tassā me, bhante, ayyo ānando accayaṃ accayato paṭiggaṇhātu, āyatiṃ saṃvarāyā”ti.
an4.159:9.4: “Taggha taṃ, bhagini, accayo accagamā, yathābālaṃ yathāmūḷhaṃ yathāakusalaṃ, yā tvaṃ evamakāsi.
an4.159:9.5: Yato ca kho tvaṃ, bhagini, accayaṃ accayato disvā yathādhammaṃ paṭikarosi, taṃ te mayaṃ paṭiggaṇhāma.
an4.159:9.6: Vuddhi hesā, bhagini, ariyassa vinaye yo accayaṃ accayato disvā yathādhammaṃ paṭikaroti āyatiṃ saṃvaraṃ āpajjatī”ti.
